original_text: A person who has burnt his skin might have a red or white mark. It might be where he burnt himself.
korean_text: 피부가 불에 데었는데 그 덴 곳에 불그스름하고 희거나 순전히 흰 색점이 생기면

sentences.original_text: A person who has burnt his skin
might have a red or white mark
sentences.korean_translation: 붉거나 흰 자국이 있을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: It might be where he burnt himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 자신을 화상 입은 곳일 수 있다
